# ui-toggle



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Individual toggle button within a toggle group

## Properties

| Property             | Attribute  | Description                     | Type      | Default     |
| -------------------- | ---------- | ------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `disabled`           | `disabled` | Whether this toggle is disabled | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `value` _(required)_ | `value`    | Value for this toggle           | `string`  | `undefined` |


## Slots

| Slot | Description                                           |
| ---- | ----------------------------------------------------- |
|      | Default slot for toggle content (text, icon, or both) |
